name: Printing , scaled up.
description:
It's time to make some art in the console!
Take the following design and create an algorithm for it to be scaled up and down:
```
 __
/\/\
 ||
```

Test cases

1:
```
 __
/\/\
 ||
```

3:
```
 __________
/\/\/\/\/\/\
   |    |
   |    |
   |    |
```

10:
```
 ______________________________________
/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\
          |                  |
          |                  |
          |                  |
          |                  |
          |                  |
          |                  |
          |                  |
          |                  |
          |                  |
          |                  |
``` 
Note:
- There will always be a design: `/\` is the smallest/default.
- All values higher than 100 default to 100
- break it down piece-by-piece!
